name: Bipolar Game
description: Puzzle game where you must guide your object to the exit portal of each stage. To aid you, you have the magnetic powers of positive and negative energy, that will cause you to be either pulled towards (if your using an opposite power) or pushed away from (if your using the same power).
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 20 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 20 MB available space Sound Card: Any

reviews.review_text: Great game with unique levels. How do you make a game though?
